author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c
(close_edit): Another call to svn_wc_entry() bites the dust in favor of
svn_wc__get_entry().

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Vote for r35958 group.

author: rhuijben
msg: Make svn_wc_context_t live as long as result_pool instead of as long as
a child pool of result_pool.
APR destroys child pools before running the pool cleanup handlers, so this
behavior was visible from cleanup handlers of the parent pool.
When access batons were allocated in the same pool as the wc_ctx, these
batons lived a bit longer than the wc-database. When these batons were
closed by their cleanup handler this caused a segfault. (Visible in switch
tests 18).
* subversion/libsvn_wc/context.c
(svn_wc_context_create, svn_wc__context_create_with_db):
Set state pool to result pool, instead of a new child pool.
(svn_wc_context_destroy): Run the cleanup handler instead of
destroying the state pool.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/merge.c
(svn_wc__merge_internal): Swap out another svn_wc_entry() call with
svn_wc__get_entry().

author: arfrever
msg: On the '1.6.x' branch:
* STATUS: Nominate r38850 and r38851. Vote for some revisions.
